name: Rolling the Die
description:
Rolling the die is a short turn-based narrative game that follows a dice trying to finally roll. This was made for the GMTK game jam 2022 in 12 hours.  Use the sides of the dice to damage the enemies to make it to the end.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys - Move

Check out the devlog on my channel coming soon:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjP6jgf6rMu231TSdePXTwg
